TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebPartVerbRenderMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how verbs should be rendered on a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property determines whether verbs on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a Web Parts zone are rendered in each control's title bar, or in a drop-down verbs menu. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode> enumeration contains values that can be applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property to specify how the verbs should be rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode Menu = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Verbs are rendered in a shortcut menu in the title bar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode TitleBar = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Verbs are rendered as links directly in the title bar.
